body_html:
Aha, @fwalch was right. I thought all variables were initialized when I ran initialize_all_variables() so I missed the local initialization. My bad.

Just curious. Under what circumstance do you not want to initialize the local variables?
body_text:

Just curious. Under what circumstance do you not want to initialize the local variables?
body:
Aha, @fwalch was right. I thought all variables were initialized when I ran `initialize_all_variables()` so I missed the local initialization. My bad.

Just curious. Under what circumstance do you _not_ want to initialize the local variables?
